about_the_game:
Welcome to the Knitted and Inflatable!

As a young grand-daughter of a skilled defender of the Knitted City you are about to embark on adventure!
The World Of Inflated invaded The Knitted World and they are seeking to conquer it, and only you can save the day!

But every skilled Knitted City Defender has to have a powerful weapon...

The Hurricane!

Hurricane is basically your best friend in the Knitted And Inflatable.
It's a multi-purpose tool that allows you to push and pull things with the power of wind turbines inside this little beast.
With Hurricane you can utilize in-game physics, placing boxes on top of each other to create stairs or to clear the path in front of you, for instance.
But on top of that you can fight the Rubber Invaders with the Hurricane, simply pushing them over to the defensive structures of Knitted City, such as needles!

It's time to fight the Invaders!

The Inflated are crawling almost everywhere in the Knitted City since the invasion. Whenever you find the Rubber guy, find the needles nearby and push him on them or throw a box onto him. The Invader will deflate and leave you with some rubber that you can use to craft rubber tools, like a rubber trampoline that will give you more freedom of traversal in the game!

No to gore and violence!

Knitted And Inflatable is a fresh look onto First Person Shooters that doesn't involve gore, violence or blood and challenges you at the same time.
So, stop reading, get the Hurricane and save the Knitted City!
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Knitted and Inflatable!

As a young grand-daughter of a skilled defender of the Knitted City you are about to embark on adventure!
The World Of Inflated invaded The Knitted World and they are seeking to conquer it, and only you can save the day!

But every skilled Knitted City Defender has to have a powerful weapon...

The Hurricane!

Hurricane is basically your best friend in the Knitted And Inflatable.
It's a multi-purpose tool that allows you to push and pull things with the power of wind turbines inside this little beast.
With Hurricane you can utilize in-game physics, placing boxes on top of each other to create stairs or to clear the path in front of you, for instance.
But on top of that you can fight the Rubber Invaders with the Hurricane, simply pushing them over to the defensive structures of Knitted City, such as needles!

It's time to fight the Invaders!

The Inflated are crawling almost everywhere in the Knitted City since the invasion. Whenever you find the Rubber guy, find the needles nearby and push him on them or throw a box onto him. The Invader will deflate and leave you with some rubber that you can use to craft rubber tools, like a rubber trampoline that will give you more freedom of traversal in the game!

No to gore and violence!

Knitted And Inflatable is a fresh look onto First Person Shooters that doesn't involve gore, violence or blood and challenges you at the same time.
So, stop reading, get the Hurricane and save the Knitted City!
name: Knitted And Inflatable

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 760 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS ARE NOT FULLY TESTED AT THE MOMENT!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 760 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS ARE NOT FULLY TESTED AT THE MOMENT!

crl.descriptors: В игре отсутствуют кровь, люди и животные. Присутствуют сражения.

short_description: Knitted And Inflatable is a story about the stand-off between The World of Knitted and The World of Inflatable. It's a fresh look onto First Person Shooters that brings challenge, physics and cute visuals without blood, gore and violence!
